title: Al Cohn, Richie Kamuca, Bill Perkins - The Brothers! (1955-56)
description:
AL COHN, RICHIE KAMUCA, BILL PERKINS - THE BROTHERS!

01. Blixed    [3:48]
02. Kim's Kaper    [3:13]
03. Rolling Stone    [3:08]
04. Sioux Zan    [3:08]
05. The Walrus    [2:48]
06. Blue Skies    [3:12]
07. Gay Blade    [3:17]
08. Three Of A Kind    [3:13]
09. Hags!    [3:19]
10. Pro-Ex    [3:04]
11. Strange Again    [3:19]
12. Cap Snapper    [3:39]
13. Memories Of You    [3:02]
14. Saw Buck    [3:22]
15. Chorus For Morris    [3:22]
16. Slightly Salty    [3:15]

Al Cohn - tenor sax
Richie Kamuca - tenor sax
Bill Perkins - tenor sax
Hank Jones - piano
Barry Galbraith - guitar (2-3, 6-8, 10, 13 & 16)
Jimmy Raney - guitar (1, 4-5, 9, 11-12 & 14-15)
John Beal - bass
Chuck Flores - drums

Recorded for RCA Victor in New York, June 24 & 25, 1955

BONUS SESSION:

17. Just Friends    [5:09]
18. All Of Me    [4:32]
19. Limehouse Blues    [3:18]
20. Solid De Sylva    [4:31]
21. Sweet And Lovely    [5:02]

Richie Kamuca - tenor sax
Bill Perkins - tenor sax, bass clarinet & flute
Hampton Hawes - piano
Red Mitchell - bass
Mel Lewis - piano

Recorded in Los Angeles, October 29, 1956

2011 Essential Jazz Classics
